title: ready to uninstall
body: can you explain to me how i have gone from 26 MS ping to 190-500 but only on league? none of my other games lag like this and when i manage to get my ping down to 100MS i keep getting disconnected??? its not an ISP issue and my computer cost more than my car so its not hardware related. im really starting to get over this.

replies.body: Could you check out the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and perform the steps listed? You should run a tracert  as described on the [Network Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) and see where your lag starts at. Post your tracert results and let me know if anything helps.
